post_text: April 8, 2016 at 11:55 AM#1Hi All,Would anyone know how to write a macro that turns the remotes Login enabled/disabled on and off?Would probably be two macros one that turned it on and one that turned it off.Help would be appreciated.Cheers,Peter.
